title: Virtual.Dark.Angel.Season.3.with.printer.friendly.versions[from
description:
Fox decided to drop this great show after only 2 seasons.  This left many unanswered questions and many angry and disappointed fans.  But through the hard work of a group of dedicated fans we now have a virtual season 3.  Instead of watching the show you can read it instead.  Each episode takes about as long, maybe a little longer, to read than it would to watch a real episode, and they?re all excellent =)  These writers did a fantastic job in bringing the fans of Dark Angel the answers that they were craving!  Great job Virtual Dark Angel Team, and thanks a lot!!!


This is a virtual season 3 for Dark Angel from www.virtualdarkangel.com  It contains all 22 episodes from the virtual season 3 in compact rich text documents.  There is also a printer friendly copy of each episode formatted to fit onto as few pages as possible.  Non-printer-friendly versions are around 25 or 30 pages while the printer-friendly versions are only 8 or 10 so you can see the need for this if you want to print these =)  You can download pdfs of each episode online or read the episodes online but here I have packaged them all together in a much smaller package, along with printer-friendly versions.

I highly recommend visiting www.virtualdarkangel.com for the other extra stuff there!


***YES THIS IS FOR REAL!!***  

***Please check out the first Episode "Labyrinth" if you&#039;re skeptical.  This is legit, I hate hackers and viruses too!  =)

Enjoy!
